rows.label: tev000291_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, our dear friend [ST:playername ].
You have come at a most fortuitous moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0002
rows.name:
This good Ma-non fellow intends to buy one of our
many fine creations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0003
rows.name:
However, he wishes to pay us not in credits,
but in pizza![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0004
rows.name:
We have stressed repeatedly that we rarely eat pizza,
but he remains quite adamant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0005
rows.name:
We are reminded of your human aphorism that a nod
is as good as a drink with a blind horse. How true![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0006
rows.name:
It matters naught how good this frozen pizza is—
a barter economy is not a viable model.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: tev000291_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that L could sell the pizza to other Ma-non.

rows.label: tev000291_JNK0020
rows.name: Admire

rows.label: tev000291_SEL0021
rows.name: Express admiration at L's business acumen.

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0007
rows.name: Hmm. An intriguing proposition.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0008
rows.name: That possibility had not occurred to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0009
rows.name:
We are reminded of the time we sold a small rock
found in Noctilum to a superstitious woman for
3,000 credits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0010
rows.name:
Very well. We shall sell the pizza at an elevated price
to other Ma-non who have bought into the pizza fad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0011
rows.name: But... Hold a moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0012
rows.name:
Surely the customer that overpays for the pizza would
come to fiercely regret being taken advantage of,
and later spurn our business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0013
rows.name:
We mustn't sacrifice potential long-term profits for a
small, short-term gain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0014
rows.name:
No, instead of immediately reselling these frozen pizzas
at a markup...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0015
rows.name:
We should find a way to use our talents to increase
their value, THEN resell them at an appropriate price![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0016
rows.name:
In other words, we will accept pizzas in lieu of credits
from the Ma-non, upgrade said stock of pizzas, and
then sell them to different Ma-non customers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0017
rows.name:
This could be the beginning of a beautiful new
business model![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0018
rows.name: But wait...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0019
rows.name:
That would be an endless loop of pizza—one that
would leave us without money for the rest of our days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0020
rows.name: Dear us. Whatever are we to do...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0021
rows.name: Well, as they say, "When in Rome, get to roaming."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0022
rows.name:
Mr. Nagi was kind enough to suggest a book of
economics that he believed would help us with our
fledgling business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0023
rows.name:
He mentioned that it had been written by the founder
of Sakuraba Industries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0024
rows.name:
We found it to be tremendously interesting—both for
learning Earth history and traditions, as well as
economics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0025
rows.name:
And now that we think back, the book stressed that
one must always prioritize long-term gains over
short-term profits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0026
rows.name:
We suppose that would include being willing to accept
pizza as a means of payment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0027
rows.name:
So perhaps we could find a way to increase the value
of the pizza, then resell it at an appropriate markup?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0028
rows.name:
This could be the beginning of a beautiful new
business model![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000291_MSG0029
rows.name:
We need to begin developing new products at once,
lest we wander this opportunity. We will continue our
conversation another day![ST:wait ]
